footerInfo.description: UMeetMe is a digital communication platform that provides digital product solutions to help companies connect with their customers.
footerInfo.officeAddress: Menara Bandung Digital Valley, Jl. Gegerkalong Hilir No.47, Sukarasa, Kec. Sukasari, Kota Bandung, Jawa Barat 40152

businessPage.subHeader: Video-conferencing with higher service. Optimizing work time by utilizing resources and hardware. Meeting and discussing can be held up to 50 participants limit, anytime, anywhere.
businessPage.detailSubHeader1: Host has participant control during the meeting.
businessPage.detailSubHeader3: You can share and watch YouTube videos together during the meeting.
businessPage.aboutSubHeader1: Distance and time, that's not a big problem because you can still discuss and share information with your employees or anyone around the world at any time.
businessPage.aboutSubHeader2: You can report information quickly to everyone when there is an emergency, using any device with the live streaming feature.
businessPage.aboutSubHeader3: Activities such as observation, recruitment, training, etc. can be done virtually, which can reduce travel costs and optimize time.

eduPage.subHeader: Video-conferencing with higher service. Optimizing work time by utilizing resources and hardware. Meeting and discussing can be held up to 50 participants limit, anytime, anywhere.
eduPage.detailSubHeader1: Draw your subject material easier trough visuals.
eduPage.detailSubHeader2: Create your documents during online classes by collaborating with other participants.
eduPage.detailSubHeader3: Listing the student attendance directly using system.
eduPage.aboutSubHeader1: Learning more easy with online classes will be more free and fun with unlimited duration and share screen feature, to support the learning material during online classes or other virtual activity.
eduPage.aboutSubHeader2: We provide a collaboration API to support the effectiveness of LMS (Learning Management System) activities in Indonesia.
eduPage.aboutSubHeader3: To participate in supporting and developing "Go Digital" programs for education in Indonesia. We provide online media classes, formal and informal education for free.

carousel.subHeader: Here are easy ways how to start connecting with anyone.
carousel.step1Content: Choose any name for your room, and type on the room
carousel.step2Content: Copy the link and share it via email, chat, text, etc., to invite anyone to join
carousel.step3Content: Enjoy your video conference with others.

footer1.header: Video-conferencing with higher service. Optimizing work time by utilizing resources and hardware. Meeting and discussing can be held up to 50 participants limit, anytime, anywhere.

banner.title:
Unlimited Video
Conference Anytime,
Anywhere
banner.description:
UMeetMe is a video conferencing platform, which serve an easy, fast, and
convenient digital solution for communication.

descProductOne.title: Easy
descProductOne.desc: UMeetMe offers video communication with your colleagues, friends, and family with ease from your own device anytime, anywhere.

descProductTwo.title: Unlimited
descProductTwo.desc: UMeetMe enables you to hold unlimited communication.

descProductThree.title: Free
descProductThree.desc: UMeetMe allows you to stay in touch and be productive without having to pay fees.
